_shortDesc: New York is a vibrant city full of life and energy. It is home to the iconic Statue of Liberty, the Empire State Building, and Times Square. The city is known for its diverse culture, world-class restaurants, and endless entertainment. It is a hub for business, finance, fashion, and art. There are endless attractions to explore, from the High Line to Central Park. Whether you're looking for a night out on the town or a quiet stroll through the city, New York has something for everyone.

Royalton is a town in Niagara County, New York. It is located in the western part of the county, near the Niagara River. The town was first settled in 1809 and was incorporated in 1821. It is home to the Royalton-Hartland Central School District, which serves the area. The town is known for its rural atmosphere and its proximity to Niagara Falls. It is home to several parks, including the Royalton Ravine Park and the Royalton Falls Park. The town also has a number of historic sites, including the Royalton Town Hall and the Royalton Academy. Royalton is a great place to live and visit, offering a peaceful atmosphere and plenty of outdoor activities.

Times Square is a major commercial intersection and tourist destination in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. It is located at the junction of Broadway and Seventh Avenue and stretches from West 42nd to West 47th Streets. It is one of the world's most visited tourist attractions, drawing an estimated 50 million visitors annually. Times Square is home to many iconic landmarks, including the Broadway theaters, the TKTS discount ticket booth, the New Year's Eve ball drop, and the many giant digital billboards. It is also home to a variety of restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues, making it a vibrant and exciting place to visit.

The Millennium Hotel Broadway Times Square is a modern hotel located in the heart of New York City. It offers guests a convenient location near Times Square, the Theater District, and the Empire State Building. The hotel features comfortable rooms with modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and minibars. On-site dining options include a restaurant and bar, as well as a 24-hour fitness center. The hotel also offers a business center, meeting rooms, and a concierge service. Guests can enjoy a variety of nearby attractions, including Central Park, Rockefeller Center, and the Museum of Modern Art.

Whether you're in town for business or pleasure, the New York Marriott Marquis is the perfect place to stay.

Midtown Manhattan is the bustling heart of New York City. It is home to iconic landmarks such as the Empire State Building, Times Square, and Rockefeller Center. Midtown is also a major commercial and business hub, with many of the world's largest companies having their headquarters here. It is also a popular tourist destination, with its many attractions, restaurants, and shopping opportunities. Midtown is also home to some of the city's most prestigious universities, including Columbia University and New York University. With its vibrant energy and endless possibilities, Midtown Manhattan is a must-visit destination for any traveler.
